About Me

Let me tell you about myself...

BIO

My name is Rahul Mohata and I am a full-stack Web and Mobile Application Developer, currently living in New Delhi, India. I am a sophomore persuing Bachelor of Technology in Information Technology from MAIT, GGSIPU. I am fond of developing websites and mobile applications. I am both driven and self-motivated, constantly experimenting with new technologies and techniques

Past Experiences (Internships)

PaprClip Technologies Ltd.
Junior Developer
May 2020 - June 2020

PaprClip provides a hassle-free digital solution for paperless billing & data analytics to retail merchants. Their product has been awarded by the University of Texas & the US State. My day to day responsibilities included working with React Native on the front end to improve and iterate Android and iOS applications, Writing code for the app logic as well as the business logic using reducers, actions, and frameworks, Diagnose and perform bug fixes along with performance bottlenecks, Create and maintain documentation for the project, Drive the discussions and decisions of technical topics related to the team.

Entebyte Ltd.
Front End Developer
March 2020 - May 2020

Entebyte has a project called Heatil Social, which is a fitness club management app and a social network for fitness lovers.It is available on web as well as mobile platforms. My day to day responsibilities included working with NextJs along with React Native Web to create various screens for the web app, Creating reusable react native components, Improving the old UI and performing bug fixes, Maintaining proper documentation for the project
